name: Kernöl Redemption 3D
description:
Story

A scientist in the Graz science museum took inspiration from the museum and decides to clone himself. Because why not! He creates a whole bunch of clones and unfortunately society is really upset about that and want to kill them. Help Hans and his swarm of clones to reach Aufsteirern safely so that he can prove how cute and peaceful they are.

How are clones generated? 

Of course with Kernöl. What a stupid question. But be careful Kernöl is not equal Kernöl!

Sounds easy right?

Wrong! There are traps, evil policeman and other deadly surprises which will require your 100% working super mega brain and your 97% on point masterful keyboard controls to protect as many clones as possible ... and yourself of course!

What are you waiting for?

Watch the video and play the game yourself. You won't regret it!

Translations for not German speaking but highly motivated people:

  • Kernöl = pumpkin seed oil
Team
  • Claudio Kirchmair
  • Lukas Knoflach
  • Stefan Kocher
  • Stephan Steinberger
